title: >>> The First FIRST!
body_text:
It is now time for the first official DODGEBALL 50 preview!
..........
For weeks, captains warfare has been the main focus of the past season. The reigning champion, the legendary Kevin Adams, is ready for his next challenge after defeating two of the biggest icons in the sport in Sara DeCuir and most recently John Tronolone.
As of now, Kevin stands without a challenging opponent. However, that will all change as Kevin, who has already agreed to such a stipulation, will not be facing one opponent ... he'll be facing two!
That's right, already a first for the soon-to-be spectacle DODGEBALL 50, a huge tag team main event is in store! Kevin, with a partner of his choosing, will square off against another two-person team in a 2 vs. 2 captains battle! This will certainly be a most unique confrontation as never before as such a match taken place. But at DODGEBALL 50, that will all change.
The following message is for all hopeful participants:
- All you have to do is find a partner. There will be some sort of contest or game either before or at DODGEBALL 50 to decide who gets the opportunity to face Kevin and his mystery partner. It's that simple.
Kevin Adams & ???
vs.
??? & ???
First-ever 2-on-2 captains battle!
